results.description: Here in the San Francisco East Bay, we establish strong and successful insurance agencies. This is the perfect career for anyone looking for flexibility and an uncapped earning potential. At Farmers we train and support our agents as you build a lifelong career in the insurance and financial services industry. Our goal is to provide an opportunity for entrepreneurs, small business owners, sales focused individuals, or individuals from other industries a chance to step into the Insurance industr…
